title: 怎么下载游戏唱片的音乐
author: 密云
txt_content: 自从玩了20w18a就感觉pigstep很好听，想下载，但是网上没有pigstep，求个人告诉我去哪里下载...

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
https://launchermeta.mojang.com/ ... 8d519665a/1.16.json

 "minecraft/sounds/records/pigstep.ogg": {"hash": "9ffb1791e8aba8f266a673abec1846c3bf8fb8cc",

然后下载这个文件，后缀改成 ogg 即可
https://resources.download.minec ... 3abec1846c3bf8fb8cc

改好的 https://c-t.work/s/d93a37e9e1fd4b

replies.author: PTSD∝龌龊闵
replies.txt_content:
在材质里面
C:\Users\XXXX\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\versions
找到对应的版本号
把jar文件解压
再全局搜搜唱片名就可以了

replies.author: 密云
replies.txt_content: 好吧那我先试试吧，蟹蟹大佬们

replies.author: LSS_wwwwwww
replies.txt_content: 去网上搜我的世界原版音乐大全(*Φ皿Φ*)
